pros: Fullfilling job serving individuals with various disabilities. Great staff working a long time for the organization. Low pay for some positions but good benefits.
cons: Often a disconnect between direct care staff and middle/upper management.

job_title: Special Education Paraprofessional in Roosevelt, NY
pros: The children were so sweet and smart
cons: Lack of reliable resources for staff.

job_title: Direct Care Counselor in Bronx, NY
pros:
Working for this company provided me with great experience good and bad. I just felt like they are not about team work and it management against staff
Pro is 1199 benefits
cons: Low pay, poor management, and no team work

review_title: Good place to build work experience but doesn't appreciate staff
job_title: Direct Care Staff in New York, NY
pros: Okay benefits and plenty of ot, and you get to form bond with individuals who are mentally and physically handicap, very rewarding if you are kind at heart and patient
cons: Managers does not care about employees and pay does not match the work load, the turn over rate is very high and they are always short staff.

pros: This company offers a very generous benefits package.  It's a great place if benefits are important to you and you plan to stay a while.
cons: There is a very competitive streak among the different department heads and this often impedes cooperation. If you can work well with little assistance, then this can be the place for you.

job_title: Direct Care Counselor in New York, NY
pros: 1199 SEIU BENEFITS ARE GREAT ESPECIALLY IF YOU ARE MARRIED AND/OR HAVE KIDS
cons: No raise, team work can be better, management can be a problem

job_title: Job Coach Trainer in New York, NY
pros: Get to interact with some amazing individuals and help them obtain and maintin employment in the community.
cons: It's not what you know or how you do your job, but who you know and how far they are willing to bend the rules to get you your desired location and salary.

job_title: Borough Clinical Nursing Supervisor in Maspeth, NY
pros: Self satisfaction of helping those who can not do anything on their own and who have been abandoned by their families; especially those who are mentally and developmentally handicapped.
cons: Low salary and my job requires a lot of travelling.

job_title: Reimbursement & Entitlements Manager in New York, NY
pros: This employer is very understanding of family time.  The mission to provide the best care to people with disabilities is inspirational.
cons: overlook employees with excellent work ethic and skills

job_title: Direct Care Staff in Brooklyn, NY
pros: Assisiting individuals with disabilities and watching them smile.
cons: Pay could be better! no other complaints

job_title: Special Education Teacher in Auburn, NY
pros: Great co-teachers, excellent time off/school district work schedule
cons: pay is way below area/district average teacher pay
They really don't care about their staff or their well being
